articles.author: Hope Sloop, Kamal Saltan
articles.title: Lululemon CEO who fired employees for confronting thieves stands by decision - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lululemon's CEO said he stands by the decision to fire two employees who did not abide by the company's theft policy during a recent robbery in Georgia.
articles.content:
Lululemon's CEO has said he stands by firing two workers who did not abide by the company's theft policy when they confronted thieves during a robbery in Georgia.
Jennifer Ferguson and Rachel Rogers… [+4540 chars]

articles.title: Germany targets $2.1 bln in funding for Thyssenkrupp green steel plant - Reuters
articles.description: Germany is planning to make around 2 billion euros ($2.1 billion) available to help fund a green steel plant that Thyssenkrupp (TKAG.DE) aims to build at its base in Duisburg, one of the …
articles.content: BERLIN/FRANKFURT, June 5 (Reuters) - Germany is planning to make around 2 billion euros ($2.1 billion) available to help fund a green steel plant that Thyssenkrupp (TKAG.DE) aims to build at its base… [+1933 chars]
